subject: Football
lead_paragraph: The N.F.L.’s meetings begin Monday in Palm Beach, Fla., and among the items under discussion is a possible ban on hair hanging from the back of helmets. The idea of banning long hair — players would be allowed to tuck it under their helmets — was proposed by the Kansas City Chiefs.
